name: Rupert Murdoch
occupation: Chairman and CEO of News Corporation (1975–2012) ,  Executive chairman of News Corp (2013–present) ,  Chairman and CEO of 21st Century Fox (2010–2015) ,  Executive co-chairman of 21st Century Fox (2015–present)
spouse: Patricia Booker, (1953–1959, 1 child) Anna Murdoch Mann, (1961–1996, 3 children) Wendi Deng Murdoch
